An unofficial collection of various utilities (QoL additions) for the TruckersMP website.

Feature(s):
- Report button on player profiles
- Accepted/declined report percentage

If you have any suggestions, feel free to ping me (@proxied.host) in #development channel of the TruckersMP Discord server or leave a comment on the forum thread: https://forum.truckersmp.com/index.php?/topic/115866-truckersmp-utilities-an-extension-with-useful-or-not-qol-improvements
